name: club-operations-pos
description: Multi-application system for managing club check-ins, room inventory, cleaning workflows, and operational metrics

scripts.dev: pnpm kill-ports && concurrently -n api,kiosk,register,dashboard,cleaning -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan "pnpm --filter @club-ops/api dev" "pnpm --filter @club-ops/customer-kiosk dev" "pnpm --filter @club-ops/employee-register dev" "pnpm --filter @club-ops/office-dashboard dev" "pnpm --filter @club-ops/cleaning-station-kiosk dev"
